name: Blixten Quest
description: Join the battle now! Loots, craft and big world to explore! Adventure is fun right? The game is getting bigger and better.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or Above Processor: Core i5-2400 3.1GHz (Bellow is not tested) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 600+ (Bellow not tested). DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
